var.attribute2: role REQUIRED STRING 'temperature, density, enthalpy, mixture_fraction, co2, h2o, soot, specific_heat'

op.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'MULTIPLY, ADD, SUBTRACT, DIVIDE, DIVIDE_CONST_VARIABLE, DIVIDE_VARIABLE_CONST, POW, EXP'

model.attribute2: type REQUIRED STRING 'wall_heatflux_variable, variable_stats, density_predictor, CO'

type REQUIRED STRING 'cc_constant, fx_constant, laminar_pr, extent_rxn, tab_strip_factor, particle_absorption_coefficient, empirical_soot, fv_soot, algebraic_scalar_diss, scalsim_variance, heat_loss, norm_scalar_var, scalar_diss, radiation_properties'

calculator.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'constant, special, burns_christon, radprops, hottel_sarofim, GauthamWSGG'

variable.attribute1: role REQUIRED STRING 'raw_coal, char, size, density, uvel, vvel, wvel, enthalpy, temperature, max_temperature, dTdt, total_number_density'

Turbulence.attribute1: model REQUIRED STRING 'compdynamicprocedure, dynamicprocedure, smagorinsky, none'

convection_scheme.spec: REQUIRED STRING 'central, upwind, wall_upwind, old_central, old_upwind'

initialization.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'constant, taylor-green, almgren, exponentialvortex, StABL, input, shunn_moin'

norm.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'LInfinity linfinity L1 l1 L2 l2'

solver.spec: REQUIRED STRING 'smg, SMG, PFMG, pfmg, SparseMSG, sparsemsg, CG, cg, Hybrid, hybrid, GMRES, gmres'

task.attribute3: type REQUIRED STRING 'wave, random_lagrangian_particles, lagrangian_particle_velocity, lagrangian_particle_size'

grid.attribute1: dependent_type REQUIRED STRING 'svol, xvol, yvol, zvol'
grid.attribute2: independent_type REQUIRED STRING 'svol, xvol, yvol, zvol'

model.attribute2: type REQUIRED STRING 'simple_rate, drag, gravity, constant, coal_density, coal_temperature_nebo, coal_temperature, coal_mass_clip, total_number_density, fowy_devolatilization, shaddix_oxidation, shaddix_enthalpy'

conv_scheme.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'upwind, 2upwind, quick, roe_minmod, super_bee, vanleer, central, old_super_bee, super_bee_wall_upwind, vanleer_wall_upwind, roe_minmod_wall_upwind'

initialization.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'constant, step, geometry_fill, sine-x, sine-y, sine-z, gaussian, shunn_moin, tabulated, linear-x'

src.attribute2: type REQUIRED STRING 'constant_src, westbrook_dryer, coal_gas_oxi, coal_gas_heat, coal_gas_devol, coal_gas_momentum, cc_inject_src, fx_inject_src, fy_inject_src, fz_inject_src, tab_rxn_rate, cc_intrusion_inlet, fx_intrusion_inlet, fy_intrusion_inlet, fz_intrusion_inlet, BrownSootFormation_rhoYs, BrownSootFormation_nd, BrownSootFormation_Tar, do_radiation, rmcrt_radiation, bowman_nox, pc_transport, moment2_mixture_fraction_src, dissipation_src, manifold_rxn, momentum_drag_src, shunn_moin_mf_mms, shunn_moin_cont_mms'

constant.need_applies_to: type constant_src, fx_inject_src, fy_inject_src, fz_inject_src, cc_inject_src

temperature_label.need_applies_to: type westbrook_dryer, bowman_nox, BrownSootFormation_rhoYs, BrownSootFormation_nd, BrownSootFormation_Tar

conv_scheme.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'super_bee, roe_minmod, upwind, central'

type.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'Lapack-invert, Lapack-svd, LU, Optimize, Simplest'

model.attribute2: type REQUIRED STRING 'FOWYDevol, RichardsFletcherDevol, KobayashiSarofimDevol, YamamotoDevol, ConstantModel, Drag, ShaddixHeatTransfer, EnthalpyShaddix, MaximumTemperature, CharOxidationShaddix, SimpleBirth'

conv_scheme.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'upwind, 2upwind, quick, roe_minmod, vanleer, super_bee, central, old_super_bee, super_bee_wall_upwind, vanleer_wall_upwind, roe_minmod_wall_upwind'

initialization.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'env_constant, constant, env_step, step'

conv_scheme.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'upwind, 2upwind, quick, roe_minmod, vanleer, super_bee, central, old_super_bee, super_bee_wall_upwind, vanleer_wall_upwind, roe_minmod_wall_upwind'

InternalCoordinate.attribute2: type REQUIRED STRING 'uVel, vVel, wVel, scalar'

conv_scheme.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'upwind, roe_minmod, super_bee, first, second'
